Ecuador (ec)¶

Forms¶

Ecuador-specific form helpers.

class localflavor.ec.forms.ECProvinceSelect(attrs=None)[source]¶

A Select widget that uses a list of Ecuador provinces as its choices.

Data¶

localflavor.ec.ec_provinces.PROVINCE_CHOICES = ((u'A', u'Azuay'), (u'B', u'Bol\xedvar'), (u'F', u'Ca\xf1ar'), (u'C', u'Carchi'), (u'H', u'Chimborazo'), (u'X', u'Cotopaxi'), (u'O', u'El Oro'), (u'E', u'Esmeraldas'), (u'W', u'Gal\xe1pagos'), (u'G', u'Guayas'), (u'I', u'Imbabura'), (u'L', u'Loja'), (u'R', u'Los R\xedos'), (u'M', u'Manab\xed'), (u'S', u'Morona Santiago'), (u'N', u'Napo'), (u'D', u'Orellana'), (u'Y', u'Pastaza'), (u'P', u'Pichincha'), (u'SE', u'Santa Elena'), (u'SD', u'Santo Domingo de los Ts\xe1chilas'), (u'U', u'Sucumb\xedos'), (u'T', u'Tungurahua'), (u'Z', u'Zamora Chinchipe'))¶

A list of Ecuador provinces as choices in a formfield.
